name: r2-uploader
title: Cloudflare R2 File Uploader
description: Upload any files to Cloudflare R2 with optional AVIF conversion for images. After upload, the URL or Markdown link will be copied to clipboard.
author: Silas

commands.name: r2-uploader
commands.title: Upload File to R2
commands.subtitle: Cloudflare R2
commands.description: Upload any files to Cloudflare R2 with optional AVIF conversion for images. After upload, the URL or Markdown link will be copied to clipboard.

preferences.name: r2AccessKeyId
preferences.title: R2 Access Key ID
preferences.description: Your Cloudflare R2 access key ID

preferences.name: r2SecretAccessKey
preferences.title: R2 Secret Access Key
preferences.description: Your Cloudflare R2 secret access key

preferences.name: r2AccountId
preferences.title: R2 Account ID
preferences.description: Your Cloudflare account ID (the part before .r2.cloudflarestorage.com in your R2 URL)

preferences.name: convertToAvif
preferences.title: Convert to AVIF
preferences.description: Convert images to AVIF format before uploading
preferences.label: Convert to AVIF

preferences.name: avifQuality
preferences.title: AVIF Quality
preferences.description: Quality setting for AVIF conversion (0-100, default: 80)

preferences.name: generateMarkdown
preferences.title: Generate Markdown
preferences.description: Generate Markdown formatted links instead of plain URLs
preferences.label: Generate Markdown

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
